titlestmt.titleproper: Susan Brynteson collection of Delaware Theatre Company 1982-2004 1982-1996
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Susan Brynteson collection of Delaware Theatre Company
did.repository: University of Delaware Special Collections Department Morris Library, 181 South College Avenue Newark, DE 19717-5267

bioghist.p: Susan Brynteson is the May Morris Director of Libraries at the University of Delaware, and was a member of the board of directors of the Delaware Theatre Company. Brynteson has served as president of the Association for Library Collections and Technical Services, and on the American Library Association Council.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of Delaware Theatre Company records collected by Susan Brynteson in her role as a member of the theater's Board of Directors. Materials include: minutes of the board of directors meetings; meeting schedules and agendas; financial reports and annual reports; memoranda; correspondence; copies of "Encores," the theater's newsletter; announcements of plays; playbills; clippings and reviews; and advertising. These materials date from the mid-1980s to the mid-1990s. The collection also includes a promotional DVD for the theater from 2004.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
